name: Bass Fuzz
details:
FuzzThe Devi Ever Bass Fuzz Guitar Effects Pedal is a bass-heavy fuzz pedal with expansive filter tone control. A filter knob highlights overtones over the fundemental. The Bass Fuzz pedal has an Intensity flip switch that increases fuzz intensity and adds a gated attack with a lot of sustain. Operates on a 9-volt battery.
True bypass
MXR sized enclosure
Boutique quality components
Incredibly low mA draw
Silicon transistor based
9 volt, 2.1 mm, negative tip power jack
9 volt battery snap inside (unscrew the back plate)
Controls:
Volume knob: lots of gain on tap
Filter knob: emphasize the highs, or lows, to your liking
Intensity flip switch: increases fuzz intensity
*graphics or knobs may vary.
